sentence.Network_en: Her story is sharply evocative of Italian provincial life.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的故事让人清晰地回忆起意大利的乡村生活。

sentence.Network_en: The taste of the cakes was evocative of my childhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些蛋糕的味道唤起了我对童年的回忆.

sentence.Network_en: His talk was evocative of the bygone days.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的谈话令人回忆起往昔的时日.

flower development can be distinguished by three phases : flowering determination , flower evocation , and floral organ development .花的发育分为开花决定、花的发端和花器官的发育三个阶段。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin evocativus, from evocat- 'called forth', from the verb evocare (see evoke)

entry.tran: 唤起回忆的;引起感情共鸣的
entry.def: If you describe something as evocative, you mean that it is good or interesting because it produces pleasant memories, ideas, emotions, and responses in people.

example.ex: Her story is sharply evocative of Italian provincial life.
example.tran: 她的故事让人清晰地回忆起意大利的乡村生活。

sentences.sentence: "cannot forbear to close on this redolent literary note"- Wilder Hobson

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's an evocative image, Love on an Oil Rig.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whether music can actually describe the world or whether it is merely evocative.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……倾向(性质)的;……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或物等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: affirm肯定+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赞成的,肯定的
argument争论+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.爱争论的,好辩论的
authority权威,威信+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.权威性的,命令式的
e出+voc喊+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→把感情喊出来
figu形体,用形象比喻+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.比喻的,借喻的
lucr钱+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赚钱的,有利可图的
represent代表+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.典型的,有代表性的
talk讲话+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.罗嗦的
preserve保存+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.防腐的,防腐剂
sed坐+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.[药物]镇静的,镇静剂
represent描述,表示+ative人或物等→n.代表

means.word_mean: (~of sth) 引起…记忆的, 唤起…感情的

sentences.en: The taste of the cakes was evocative of my childhood.
sentences.cn: 这些蛋糕的味道唤起了我对童年的回忆。
